title: Gamsby River
whats_it_like: Ultra-classic, coastal wilderness multiday.  3 days of white water.  2 days of flat.
scouting_portaging: All rapids can be scouted/portaged.  Walking the canyons due to high water would be a major undertaking.

time.original: 5 days minimum.  6 or 7 are recommended in case of high water portaging or for enjoying the area.

when_to_go: Late August, early September.  Getting the correct level is one of the most challenging logistics to this trip.
